LanguageData.ComponentFuelTank.label: fueling compoment
LanguageData.ComponentFuelTank.description: metal parts such as fuel tank, carburetor, fuel pump and filter that is necessary for a fuel powered vehicle.
LanguageData.ComponentTransmission.label: transmisson compoment
LanguageData.ComponentTransmission.description: Metal parts such as driveshafts, gearboxes, differentials and planetary gears that are necessary to transmit torque.
